title: OpenNerve
description: Open-source implantable pulse generator platform for bioelectronic medicine research. Includes stimulation leads, recording capabilities, and biomarker sensing. Developed by CARSS with NIH SPARC support.

title: OpenAVNS
description: Community-led open source project developing a wearable auricular vagus nerve stimulator. Hardware, firmware, and companion app all freely available under CC-BY-4.0.

title: Susuro Mood Tracker
description: iOS app for effortless mood tracking with a simple long-press interface. Visualize emotional patterns over time and on a map, with Apple HealthKit integration. Privacy-first: all data stays on your device.
